snippet: The doyenne of French New Wave cinema, now in her 80s, has just released an enchanting five-part travel series in which she visits old friends like Chris Marker and Anouk Aimée, and makes some new ones too.
abstract: The doyenne of French New Wave cinema, now in her 80s, has just released an enchanting five-part travel series in which she visits old friends like Chris Marker and Anouk Aimée, and makes some new ones too.

headline.main: Now Screening | Travels With Agnès Varda
